title: Spanische Windtorte
description: Gloriously billowy and wildly retro, to say this complex meringue dessert decorated with fondant violets will be a talking point is an understatement! Equipment and preparation: you will need a piping bag fitted with a 1.5cm/⅝in plain nozzle, a piping bag filled with a large star nozzle, a clean small paintbrush, a sugar thermometer and a 30cm/12in heatproof (to 120C) serving plate for this recipe.
ingredients: 50g/1¾oz icing sugar, plus extra for dusting
